document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Red Sea Fishes with delineation of the Gulf of Suez, Gulf of Aqaba, endemism and Lessepsian migrants

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Red Sea Fishes with delineation of the Gulf of Suez, Gulf of Aqaba, endemism and Lessepsian migrants

subSubSection.paragraph:
Gulf of Suez :
Egypt (
Gruvel & Chabanaud 1937, as
Synagris filamentosus
).

Gulf of Aqaba :
Â¯
General distribution: Red Sea, Indian Ocean: East Africa east to Singapore .

Gulf of Suez :
Egypt ( Bayoumi 1972 ; Diamant & Porter 1983 ).
Gulf of Aqaba: Israel ( Diamant & Porter 1983 ).

Red Sea main basin: Eritrea ( RÃ¼ppell 1829 , as
Cantharus filamentosus
; Tortonese 1947a ), Saudi Arabia (
Bogorodsky et al . 2014b
), Yemen ( Kotthaus 1974b ).
General distribution: Red Sea, Indo-West Pacific: East Africa east to Philippines .

Gulf of Suez :
Egypt (
Gruvel 1936, as
Synagris tolu
).

Gulf of Aqaba :
Â¯

Red Sea main basin: Egypt (
Klunzinger 1870, as
Synagris tolu
).
General distribution: Red Sea, Indo-West Pacific: Persian Gulf east to Philippines and Vanuatu .

Gulf of Suez :
Â¯
Gulf of Aqaba: Israel ( Baranes & Golani 1993 ), Jordan ( Khalaf & Zajonz 2007 ).
General distribution: Red Sea, western Indian Ocean: East Africa east to India .

Gulf of Suez :
Egypt (Golani, 1999).
Gulf of Aqaba: Israel ( new record , based on HUJ 20285 , idenified by D. Golani).
General distribution: Red Sea, Indo-West Pacific: East Africa east to Marshall Islands and Fiji .

Parascolopsis eriomma
( Jordan & Richardson 1909)

Gulf of Suez :
Egypt ( Bayoumi 1972 ).
Gulf of Aqaba: Israel ( Baranes & Golani 1993 ; Russell & Golani 1993 ), Jordan ( Khalaf & Disi 1997 ).

Red Sea main basin:
Sudan ( Russell & Golani 1993 ).
General distribution: Red Sea, Indo-West Pacific: East Africa east to Philippines .

Scolpsis bimaculatus

General distribution: Red Sea, Indian Ocean: East Africa east to Sri Lanka and Bay of Bengal ( India ).
